website_summaries.verdict: The 5.4-inch display screen is a little smaller than some other LG smartphones, saving you money upfront, yet it still has 720p HD resolution quality.
pros: Portrait mode makes selfies look better by blurring the background
Lower price than the majority of LG phones
cons: Rear camera only has 8 megapixels of resolution, so your photos won’t be as detailed as you might like

customer_reviews.title: My phone isnt unlocked
customer_reviews.text: My phone company is saying the phone I got isn't unlocked what do I do
customer_reviews.author: mr freshy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mother in law and she liked it. Not to sophisticated and a great phone for someone who doesn’t want to spend a fortune on a Samsung or apple.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Phone volume not working. Phone unusable.
customer_reviews.text: Volume completely stopped working about a day after the return window. Can't turn up or down and shows the sound bar not moving. No volume is coming from the phone! It will be sad if I am not offered a refund Edit: no refund was ever offered. Don't buy this piece of trash phone.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Mackay

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Amazon I love my new phone

customer_reviews.text: it takes AT&T 2 days to unlock this mess and I am still waiting
customer_reviews.author: DIANE WALKER

customer_reviews.title: Garbage phone
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. This phone is super slow, and couldn't keep up with me, even during average and below average usage. It lags up constantly when multiple apps are open, the battery life is terrible and the storage space is too small. And don't even think about using it with Android Auto...it's simply just not powerful enough. I ended up getting rid of it shortly after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B. Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Price is good but touch screen isnt as responsive as expected
customer_reviews.text: Phone is unlocked .. good buy for a price ... touch sensitivity has little delays.. otherwise works good
customer_reviews.author: Usman

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for boost
customer_reviews.text: This phone said it works with boost mobile. Turns out it wont untill i take it in person. 3 hours away!!
customer_reviews.author: ezekeal west

customer_reviews.title: Reviewing my 2 years of experience with this phone!
customer_reviews.text: I had this phone for about 2 years and my overall experience was great. If I could continue using it for another two, I would. It's affordable and has all the basic features you need. After two years of use, the motherboard stopped functioning properly. Other than that and the terrible photographic quality, this phone is great! PROS Fingerprint Scanner on the back of the phone Good Battery Life Graphics are high quality Alright storage Great screen size Nice grip on back great weight CONS Terrible photos (Photos are grainy especially in the dark) Long charging time
customer_reviews.author: YourTravelAgent

customer_reviews.title: Shop around !!!! compare prices.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a back up phone and got this exact phone at walmart for $40 in the unlocked phone section... it has no carrier. i plan to use it on wifi only.. i walked out the door with it paying $47.00 with tax. I came on amazon to buy a case for it.. cant believe its nearly triple the price on here. shop around!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: LG K30-2019 Factory Unlocked Phone - 5.4" Screen - Black (U.S. Warranty)
product_meta.description: Carve your own path with the LG K30 2019 wherever you go, whatever you do, this pocket-sized device will keep up every step of the way. Sleek, light, and seamless to use, there’s nothing that will slow you down. It's stocked with all the essentials, plus a thoughtful selection of photography features that capture life in action. The 5.45" Had+ display is the perfect size To scroll through your feed or games on the go.
feature_bullets: 8 MP Autofocus rear Camera with HDR for dynamic photos
5 MP front-facing camera with front flash features portrait mode for artistic blur, Plus auto shot and gesture shot for effortless selfies
1.4 GHz quad-core Qualcomm Snapdragon MSM8917 and fast 4G LTE speed
3, 000 mAh non-removable battery built to last. Carrier-Verizon, AT&T, T-Mobile, Metro by T-Mobile (Carrier Compatibility: Please check with your carrier to verify compatibility.)
